bienvenidos
amigos!
Family Owned ~ New El Sombrero Mexican Grill Bringing A Bit Of Mexican Tradition & Taste To The Ocoee & Central Florida Community.
​
​
​
​
The Beginnings
​
​
The Zendejas Family, Owners Of El Sombrero. Have Been In The Mexican Restaurant Industry Since The Late 1990's. Opening May 1st 2020 In Mid Pandemic Was Not Easy But Not An Impossible Task. Decades Of Experience & Hard Work Gave Them The Foundation To Open Up & Pursue Their American Dream. Striving In Customer Service & Providing The Best Quality Of Food & Cocktails. We Invite You To Experience A Bit Of Our Tradtion!
About Us

El Sombrero Mexican Grill
Provides An Authentic Mexican Taste,

The Perfect Blend All Here In The Heart Of Florida.
